[ti:Outta My Head]
[ar:Khalid]
[al:Free Spirit]

[00:00.00]Outta My Head - Khalid/John Mayer (约翰·梅尔)
[00:00.82]Lyrics by：John Mayer/Khalid Robinson/John Hill/Sarah Aarons/Jamil Chammas
[00:01.64]Composed by：John Mayer/Khalid Robinson/John Hill/Sarah Aarons/Jamil Chammas
[00:02.46]I'm here outside when you're ready when you're ready for me
[00:07.16]Bring out the shots and confetti all night long
[00:11.83]I'll take you home if you love me yeah oh yeah
[00:16.34]Just promise you won't forget me no
[00:20.15]'Cause days get better when you're here so I gotta keep it
[00:25.98]Going crazy and I just can't get you outta my head
[00:30.49]Love is in the atmosphere you can feel it in the air
[00:35.11]Getting hazy and I just can't get you outta my head
[00:40.23]Ooh whoa ooh whoa
[00:42.01]Ooh whoa ooh whoa my
[00:44.86]Ooh whoa ooh whoa
[00:46.77]Ooh whoa ooh whoa my head
[00:49.71]Ooh whoa ooh whoa
[00:51.43]Ooh whoa ooh whoa my
[00:54.25]Ooh whoa ooh whoa
[00:55.64]Just can't get you outta my head
[00:58.77]We're out the door and it's raining
[01:03.15]But baby I'm not complaining no
[01:07.80]We hit the road and we're racing yeah
[01:12.29]You make me super impatient
[01:16.78]Can you feel the tension you've got my attention
[01:21.01]I know we're just friends but I'd rather be together instead yeah
[01:26.33]'Cause days get better when you're here so I gotta keep it oh ah
[01:31.91]Going crazy and I just can't get you outta my head yeah
[01:36.26]Love is in the atmosphere you can feel it in the air oh
[01:40.97]Getting hazy and I just can't get you outta my head

[01:47.40]Ooh whoa ooh whoa my

[02:00.84]Just can't get you outta my head
[02:06.02]Can't get you outta my head

data.trans:
[ti:Outta My Head]
[ar:Khalid]
[al:Free Spirit]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:00.82]//
[00:01.64]//
[00:02.46]若你准备好来见我 我随时在门外恭候
[00:07.16]带着美酒和糖果 通宵作乐
[00:11.83]如果你爱我 我会把你带回家里
[00:16.34]答应我 不要忘了我
[00:20.15]因为有了你 我的生活开心了许多 所以我要留住幸福
[00:25.98]思念成魔 你在我的脑海中无法抹去
[00:30.49]爱情是一种感觉 你可以在空气中感受到它
[00:35.11]爱意朦胧 你在我的脑海中无法抹去
[00:40.23]//
[00:42.01]我的
[00:44.86]//
[00:46.77]我的脑海中
[00:49.71]//
[00:51.43]我的
[00:54.25]//
[00:55.64]想尽办法也忘不掉你
[00:58.77]我们出门在外 可是天公不作美
[01:03.15]宝贝 我不是在抱怨什么
[01:07.80]我们开着车上路 一路驰骋
[01:12.29]你让我迫不及待
[01:16.78]你能感受到这种紧张的气氛吗 我一直在关注你
[01:21.01]我知道我们只是朋友 但我真的更愿意和你做恋人
[01:26.33]因为有了你 我的生活开心了许多 所以我要留住幸福

[01:36.26]爱情是一种感觉 你可以在空气中感受到它
